btv.download.peer

Class Peer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • btv.download.peer.Peer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Peer
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class represents a BitTorrent peer. This class will set up a connection with a remote peer and download pieces of the Torrent it is associated with until the Torrent is fully downloaded. This class will also send events to event listeners when it is connecting to the Peer or when it is communicating with the Peer.

      • Peer

        public Peer(java.lang.String ip1,
    int port1,
    Torrent t)
        This is the constructor used when we are parsing peers from a tracker response.
        Parameters:
        ip1 - The IP address of this peer.
        port1 - The port used to conenct to this peer.
        t - The Torrent this Peer is associated with.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public static Peer parse(java.lang.String bytes,
         Torrent t)
        Given a String containing 6 bytes, parse these bytes into ip:port and return a Peer object associated with t.
        Parameters:
        bytes - The byte String to parse the IP and Port from.
        t - The Torrent this peer is associated with.

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • closePeerConnection

        public void closePeerConnection()
        Close all connections to this Peer.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pausing the peer involves keeping the communication open but the peer will stop requesting pieces. When paused the Peer will periodically send keep alive messages to keep the connection open.

      • resumeDownload

        public void resumeDownload()
        Tell this peer to continue downloading. This method is used on Peers that are paused.

      • setIncoming

        public void setIncoming(boolean b)
        This method is used to set this peer as an incoming connection or a Peer that we are connecting to.
        Parameters:
        b - True if this is an incoming connection, false otherwise.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Thread
        Returns:
        A String representation of this Peer. It will contain the IP and port of this peer.

      • getIP

        public java.lang.String getIP()
        Returns:
        The IP address of this peer.

      • connected

        public boolean connected()
        Returns:
        True if this Peer has an established connection, false otherwise.

      • canDownload

        public boolean canDownload(int i)
        This method is used to check if this peer can download the Piece at position i
        Parameters:
        i - The index of the piece to check if this Peer can download.
        Returns:
        True if the bit is set in this Peers Bitfield, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        Piece, Bitfield

        Tell this Peer to cancel a specific request.
        Parameters:
        r - The Request to cancel.
